page.title: 18DRUGS IN SOUTHPORT
page.content: In Southport today many people of all cultures and ages are taking drugs. Usually they start by taking soft drugs,joints or spliffs and they like it.However they soon get tempted into cocaine or heroin.Heroin is the killer,there are few survivors and everyone connected gets hurt.Most experimentors get trapped in the drug cycle.They need more drugs and so more money.Burglary and petty theft are ways of providing the money.Youngsters involved may peddle for their dealers in return for free drugs.People begin by smoking heroin but they all end up injecting it full time.It is frightening to see the people around you killing themselves hour by hour, from twelve year olds sniffing glue on Southport Promenade to nineteen year olds injecting heroin in their homes.
